name: compound-eyes
description: This Pokémon's moves have 1.3× their accuracy.  This ability has no effect on the one-hit KO moves (fissure, guillotine, horn drill, and sheer cold).  Overworld: If the first Pokémon in the party has this ability, the chance of a wild Pokémon holding a particular item is raised from 50%, 5%, or 1% to 60%, 20%, or 5%, respectively.
